title: book all about kerning?!
content:
Look what I've spotted!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819183218im_/http:/typophile.com/files/KERN_6003.png)

Damn! book all about kerning?! Nope, it's only this guy named Kern, a Polish poet. Title on top says Four Letters in poetic inversion.

Book with such a cover should be for type nerds!
author: Grzegorz Rolek
